newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.031pts to 102.647.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index falls 0.031pts to 102.647.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds fell 0.031 points in Friday's trading to 102.647 points, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.800 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, rose 0.011 points to 99.563, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.003 points to 2.411 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 rose 2.635 points to 1,055.650.
